name: roots/wordpress

suggest.ext-dom: Used to validate Text Widget content and to automatically configuring IIS7+.
suggest.ext-exif: Works with metadata stored in images.
suggest.ext-fileinfo: Used to detect mimetype of file uploads.
suggest.ext-hash: Used for hashing, including passwords and update packages.
suggest.ext-imagick: Provides better image quality for media uploads.
suggest.ext-json: Used for communications with other servers.
suggest.ext-libsodium: Validates Signatures and provides securely random bytes.
suggest.ext-mbstring: Used to properly handle UTF8 text.
suggest.ext-mysqli: Connects to MySQL for database interactions.
suggest.ext-openssl: Permits SSL-based connections to other hosts.
suggest.ext-pcre: Increases performance of pattern matching in code searches.
suggest.ext-xml: Used for XML parsing, such as from a third-party site.
suggest.ext-zip: Used for decompressing Plugins, Themes, and WordPress update packages.

description: WordPress is open source software you can use to create a beautiful website, blog, or app.
